snippet: Scott Stallings became the first PGA Tour winner to be suspended for violating the tour’s antidoping policy.
abstract: Scott Stallings is suspended for remainder of season after turning himself in when he found that supplement he had taken for fatigue was banned by PGA Tour antidoping policy; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Scott Stallings became the first PGA Tour winner to be suspended for violating the tour’s antidoping policy.

headline.main: PGA Tour Winner Is Barred Over Doping
headline.print_headline: Tour Winner Is Barred for Doping
